column3: Seems to include many many more commits than necessary...\n
Aren't them only 2? One for the source code and one for the readme (build-osx.md) file.\n
How does anyone audit this ? anything could be linked into all that .. \n

Oh, I see. You made your changes again 0.8.6, and pull request to make that all merged into master.

I have bad news for you: we don't use the makefile.\* files anymore in master, as the autotools build system has replaced it.

Should be filed against a 0.8.x branch, not master (unsure if a 0.8.7 is ever going to be released but could be in that). It's just the commits

d27f08a2d5a788013c63190cbf79fe2b7a17e722
25f073a09e48d66e919f2aeb92df9861501a2534

NACK on the change in serialize.h
0.8.x didn't support Mavericks anyway, I don't see a reason to risk backporting this.\n
